test_metadata.test_purpose: Budget calculation test for single day Beijing trip

warnings: Day 1: No accommodation budget allocated - assumes day trip only
Day 1: Breakfast not budgeted - check-out at 09:00 suggests guest ate at hotel
recommendations: Budget well under limit at 80% utilization - significant flexibility for meal upgrades or additional activities
Consider upgrading from budget restaurants to mid-range restaurants with remaining 100 CNY
Optional: Add afternoon tea/snack break (approximately 30-50 CNY) for energy during long sightseeing day
Optional: Budget for souvenir shopping at Summer Palace (porcelain, silk) - up to 50 CNY available
Transportation costs are reasonable for 3 major attractions across different areas of Beijing
budget_notes: Single day intensive sightseeing trip to three major Beijing attractions. Schedule includes Forbidden City (imperial palace), Temple of Heaven (ceremonial complex), and Summer Palace (imperial garden residence). Total budget allocation of 400 CNY leaves comfortable 100 CNY buffer (20% reserve) for contingencies or meal improvements. All major attractions have entrance fees covered. Transportation uses mix of taxi/subway.

forbidden_city.notes: Winter rate (Nov-Mar): 40 CNY; added buffer for guide or audio guide

summer_palace.notes: Winter rate: 30 CNY; added buffer for possibility of additional gardens

lunch_near_forbidden_city.notes: Mid-range restaurant, tourist area prices (80-100 CNY typical); budget conservative

dinner.notes: Return to hotel area, mid-range restaurant (120-150 CNY typical); budget conservative for potential upgrade

transportation_analysis.notes: Beijing taxi: 3 CNY base + 2 CNY/km; Subway: 3-5 CNY flat rate; Mixed usage estimated

quality_checks.budget_calculation: PASS - All daily totals sum correctly
quality_checks.category_totals: PASS - Meals (140) + Activities (135) + Transportation (95) + Shopping (20) + Contingency (10) = 400
quality_checks.trip_total_match: PASS - Single day total matches trip total
quality_checks.budget_compliance: PASS - Total cost 400 CNY within budget of 500 CNY
quality_checks.activity_names_match: PASS - Forbidden City, Temple of Heaven, Summer Palace match timeline activities

data_sources_used: Beijing standard pricing (typical rates for Feb 2026)
Transportation analysis from timeline distance data
agent_execution.notes: Budget calculation completed successfully. All prices based on current Beijing rates for winter season. No accommodation cost as timeline shows day trip format.
